fr.upmc.components.pre.plugins.connectors

Class ComponentPluginConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • fr.upmc.components.pre.plugins.connectors.ComponentPluginConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectorI, ComponentImplementedI, OfferedI, RequiredI, ComponentPluginI, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ComponentPluginConnector
extends AbstractConnector
implements ComponentPluginI
    The class ComponentPluginConnector implements the connector used between a client component calling a server component through the interface ComponentPluginI.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : February 18, 2016

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
